original_text: When they hear the next short sound, the tribes on the south side of the camp must start to travel. Short sounds from the trumpet will tell the people that they must start to travel.
korean_text: 두 번째로 크게 불 때에는 남쪽 진영들이 행진할 것이라 떠나려 할 때에는 나팔 소리를 크게 불 것이며

sentences.original_text: When they hear the next short sound
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다음의 짧은 소리를 들을 때

sentences.original_text: the tribes on the south side of the camp
that they must start to travel
